final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    A([Start]) --> B[Check destination]
    B --> C[Set package as unknown]
    C --> D[Register package into ERP]
    D --> E[Write details on package]
    E --> F[Print delivery form]
    F --> G[Secure form in plastic packet]
    G --> H[Tap plastic packet to package]
    H --> I([End])
